summary: This document is a financial statement from Deutsche Bank detailing the account activity of Jeffrey Epstein for the month of September 2017. It includes transaction details such as deposits, withdrawals, and transfers, highlighting significant amounts and various transactions involving other individuals and entities.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the primary individual associated with the account detailed in the financial statement, showing significant transactions and balances.

persons.name: Steuart Oldfield
persons.context: Steuart Oldfield is mentioned as a contact for personal assistance regarding the account.

persons.name: Paul Morris
persons.context: Paul Morris is referenced in connection with a payment made from Epstein's account to his office account.

persons.name: David J. Mitchell
persons.context: David J. Mitchell is mentioned as a recipient of a funds transfer from Epstein's account.

persons.name: Lawrence P. Visoski
persons.context: Lawrence P. Visoski is noted as a recipient of a funds transfer from Epstein's account.

connections.description: Jeffrey Epstein made a payment to Paul Morris's office account, indicating a client-attorney relationship.
A funds transfer was made from Epstein's account to David J. Mitchell, suggesting a client-attorney relationship.
A funds transfer was made from Epstein's account to Lawrence P. Visoski, indicating a possible employer-employee relationship.

events.title: Beginning Balance
events.description: The account statement begins with a balance of $51,815,943.04 as of September 1, 2017.

events.title: Ending Balance
events.description: The account statement concludes with an ending balance of $2,844,180.72 as of September 30, 2017.

events.title: Incoming Money Transfer
events.description: An incoming money transfer of $700,000.00 was recorded on September 28, 2017.

locations: 6100 Red Hook Qtr, St. Thomas, US Virgin Islands 00802
keyFacts: The document is a financial statement from Deutsche Bank detailing Jeffrey Epstein's account activity for September 2017.
The account had a beginning balance of $51,815,943.04 and an ending balance of $2,844,180.72.
Significant transactions include multiple outgoing money transfers to various individuals, including attorneys Paul Morris and David J. Mitchell.
There are multiple preauthorized debits and checks paid from the account, indicating regular financial activity.
The document contains redacted information, including some transaction details that are not fully visible.
